scripts.prepare:bsc: mustache config/bsc.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.deploy:bsc: dotenv -- cross-var graph auth --product hosted-service %THEGRAPH_TOKEN% && graph deploy --product hosted-service binancelife/bsc
scripts.prepare:bscTestnet: mustache config/bscTestnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.deploy:bscTestnet: dotenv -- cross-var graph deploy binancelife-bscTestnet --version-label v%npm_package_version% --node %GRAPH_NODE% --deploy-key %GRAPH_NODE_KEY% --ipfs %GRAPH_IPFS%
scripts.start:dev: yarn prepare:dev && yarn create:dev && yarn deploy:dev
scripts.prepare:dev: mustache config/localhost.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.deploy:dev: dotenv -- cross-var graph deploy binancelife-dev --ipfs %GRAPH_IPFS% --node %GRAPH_NODE% --version-label v%npm_package_version%
